title: 14 Days Suspension?
body:
Did I really get a 14 day suspension for these 2 games? I called someone a ape, told them to suck my dong, and called them a nugget. Im not saying I dont deserve punishment, but I just got super tilted for some reason last night and now im ashamed of myself, but I think 14 days is a little harsh, but maybe thats because my honor level has never gotten past 2 idk.

replies.body:
Calling out peoples scores, telling people to shut up, constantly calling someone bad, spending the entire second game being rude to your Annie, spamming the chat, name calling, oh and the sexual speak.

Riot doesn't tolerate any of the above. Especially telling someone to do a sexual act.

If you had chat restrictions before, then this punishment is deserved. Heck, even if you didn't, punishment is still more than likely deserved from telling someone to do a sexual act alone.

Maybe you should take your own advice, and start muting others before you come back here complaining over a perma ban.
You must be one too, if you know who my name is.
That is so much text dude

> [{quoted}](name=StaySaltyBaby,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=J3ooaIh9,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-05-07T00:50:22.182+0000)
> "u fucking ape"

Yes, well deserved as matter of fact.

Annie gets mana back if she gets a CS with her Q

> StaySaltyBaby: annie
> StaySaltyBaby: hold onto ur fucking mana
> StaySaltyBaby: and dont use it to farm

Did you recently have a 25 game chat restriction?

If not, submit a support ticket to see why it was escalated to an immediate 14 day.
Jesus.... chat is not the point of this game man. Stop using it so much. Do you just love online social drama? Ffs... play the game, fuck your opinions and shit. Play the game.

> Pre-Game
StaySaltyBaby: jg

Should've been perma tsk tsk
Based on your op.gg, perhaps you should focus on your own gameplay and what you can do better, instead of being generally toxic in chat...griefing your team never helps with winning a match.

> [{quoted}](name=JesseQ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=J3ooaIh9,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-05-07T03:27:37.502+0000)
>
> You are doing God's work. Buy a new account for $9 and say whatever you want. You'll only get about 30 games in before you are banned but honestly anyone still playing this game seriously that hasn't hit diamond should be griefed all day, and I mean IRL, so saying what you want to those monkeys is a great catharsis after a long day at work. Don't let these babies in the comments get you down, it's a video game and you should be allowed to say whatever you want, these kids would never last in a MW2 lobby. Seriously, the more games you ruin for people the less people will play this game, and maybe it will finally die.

ik people are so sensitive id rather have a kid scream at me with their xbox live mic then having people report me for calling them a fucking nugget smh
